description:
Desktop app to help you keep track of what you need to get done


Happy new year!
Additions
The background selection UI has been redone! It's now much easier to tell what your current background is and change it as well.
──────┬──────────────────────────────────────────
Before│After
──────┼──────────────────────────────────────────
      │Remindr background setting showcase
──────┴──────────────────────────────────────────
Navigating outside of the calendar with arrow keys/WASD now moves you to the next/previous month.
Remindr datepicker navigation)
Bugfixes
- Message dialogs are now automatically hidden if open while trying to open settings/account menus at the same time
- The email reset and account deletion menus are once again closable
- Button text colors now properly adjust to accent color tone in all scenarios for improved contrast
